thread.title: Kristina

author: Kristina
title: Kristina
text: We got the big starter pack for my 4 year old mid-fall for pre-K and love it. I ironed on all the labels on his clothes and the sweaters and sweatshirts always turn up in the lost and found now. The key chains are so cute and I have on the backpack and lunch box and have also found them in the lost and found. The other sticker labels are on everything else (folder, water bottles, lunch containers, etc.) and now all his stuff is turning up. I even stuck them on our other stuff like skis, ski boots and phones. They are cute and the different sizes are convenient.
